questions.question:
What is Widget Inc.’s gross profit?

Sales = $200,000
Cost of Goods Sold = $80,000
questions.info:
To calculate gross profit, we subtract the Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) from Sales. Other expenses like selling, depreciation, and general expenses are not part of this calculation.

Gross Profit = Sales - COGS = $200,000 - $80,000 = $120,000
